title: ROACH TRAP
content:
Hi Everyone!

Please help me to know what font is in the picture. "ROACH TRAP" i don't know it's font!

Thanks a Lot in advance!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [ROACH.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150322041149/http:/typophile.com/files/ROACH.jpg) | 965.97 KB |
author: taiga_02

comments.content:
Always post your request in the [Type ID board](http://web.archive.org/web/20150322041149/http:/typophile.com/typeid).

BTW: Roach Trap is [Defused](http://web.archive.org/web/20150322041149/http:/www.dafont.com/de/defused.font?fpp=500&af=on&text=ROACH+TRAP) by Vinz, actually a weathered Eurostile font.
